entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
